text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Vietnamese press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
-- Malaysia and Vietnam have agreed to to focus cooperation efforts on banking, agriculture and forestry.
-- The National Assembly's Social Affairs Commission has proposed a series of measures aimed at reducing unemployment.
-- Algerian President Liamine Zeroual begins a three-day friendship visit to Vietnam on Monday at the invitation of President Le Duc Anh.
-- Chinese and Vietnamese officials have met for the latest in a series of talks on land border issues. The meeting, in Hanoi last week, was held in a spirit of friendship, openness and earnestness.
-- Ho Chi Minh city has proposed extending a trial "one stamp, one door" system aimed at simplifying local government procedures to all districts of the southern city.
